movingObjects

Class Frogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • movingObjects.Frogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class Frogger
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    The class that defines the Frogger game character. This class handles all movement, user interaction, and life-threatening obstacles that Frogger encounters.
    Author:
    JillianJiggs
